recommended_degree: Manajemen Pemasaran/Marketing, Logistik, Hubungan Internasional, Ilmu Komunikasi, Administrasi Bisnis (Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as a Global Operations Intern to support the team in managing daily operational activities across multiple functions. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting with order processing, documentation, and system updates.
2. Supporting coordination between internal teams involved in customer service, shipping, and operations.
3. Helping track activities and follow up on required actions to ensure smooth workflow.
4. Maintaining accurate operational data and providing general administrative support as needed.

This position is ideal for graduates interested in global operations and gaining hands-on experience in a multinational work environment.
